briefdescription.para: Operation succeeded.

briefdescription.para: Checks if geom overlaps this.
Calculate a point that is guaranteed to be on the surface of this.
Prepares the geometry, so that subsequent calls to spatial relation methods are much faster.

detaileddescription.para: This should be called for any geometry which is used for multiple relation tests against other geometries.

briefdescription.para: Returns the Dimensional Extended 9 Intersection Model (DE-9IM) representation of the relationship between the geometries.

parameterdescription.para: destination storage for any error message

simplesect.para: DE-9IM string for relationship, or an empty string if an error occurred

briefdescription.para: Tests whether two geometries are related by a specified Dimensional Extended 9 Intersection Model (DE-9IM) pattern.

parameterdescription.para: destination storage for any error message

simplesect.para: true if geometry relationship matches with pattern

briefdescription.para: Splits this geometry according to a given line.

list of new geometries that have been created with the split
true if topological editing is enabled
points that need to be tested for topological completeness in the dataset

simplesect.para: 0 in case of success, 1 if geometry has not been split, error else
